explains: n. 阴谋，密谋；阴谋集团
wordGroup: conspiracy of silence 保持缄默的密约

sentences.en: He claimed that it was all a conspiracy against him.
sentences.cn: 他声称这完全是一个针对他的阴谋。

sentences.en: They were brought to trial for treasonable conspiracy.
sentences.cn: 他们因叛国的阴谋而被交付审判。

sentences.en: He suspects there's a conspiracy to cover up the crime.
sentences.cn: 他怀疑有掩盖这桩罪行的阴谋。
